author: Pierluigi Paganini
description: Canada’s airline WestJet has suffered a cyberattack that impactd access to some internal systems and the company app. WestJet is a Canadian airline that operates both domestic and international flights. Founded in 1996, it started as a low-cost carrier and has grown to become Canada’s second-largest airline, after Air Canada. WestJet is investigating a cybersecurity […]
title: Canada’s second-largest airline WestJet is containing a cyberattack
